title: H&F Explores $9 Billion-Plus Sale of Medical Device Maker Cordis
description: Hellman & Friedman is exploring a potential sale of medical device company Cordis, people familiar with the matter said.
content: Hellman & Friedman is exploring a potential sale of medical device company Cordis, people familiar with the matter said.
